mortar.name: Mortar
mortar.description: This firework will launch an explosive up to 400ft into the air before detonating.

m90.name: M-90 Small Explosive
m90.description: A small but very dangerous explosive that is equalivant to approx. 1/2 a stick of dynamite.

airbomb.name: Airbomb
airbomb.description: A very powerful explosive that can detonate as high as 750ft in the air for a radius of over 1/4 of a mile wide.

bees.name: Bees
bees.description: A swarm or cluster of points of light that move and dissipate under their own power.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: A large ploom of smoke will emit from this small device for up to 5 minutes.

fireball.name: Fireballs
fireball.description: Multi-colored large explosive that is launched high into the sky for a magnificient blast.

snakes.name: Snakes
snakes.description: A slow moving build up of harmless black powder that simulates a snake.

firecrackers.name: Firecrackers
firecrackers.description: Small fireworks that produce a small bang when lit.

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: Small rocket that propels itself approx. 40ft into the high before exploding with a loud pop.

pop_rocks.name: Pop Rocks
pop_rocks.description: Throw these little guys into a hard surface for a small surprise, safe for all ages.

fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Several fireworks fused together for added effect, with a single fuse to light.

dragon_eggs.name: Dragon Eggs
dragon_eggs.description: A gold or silver breaking effect that ends in crackles or strobes.

roman_candle.name: Roman Candle
roman_candle.description: A small tube of multiple small illuminious balls the fire from one end.

ground_spinners.name: Ground Spinners
ground_spinners.description: Small lightweight disks that send sparks while spinning on the ground.

fountain.name: Fountain
fountain.description: Small circlular base that emits a consistant flow of sparks upward.

aqua_shell.name: Aqua Shell
aqua_shell.description: A shell designed to be launched across, and break on, water.

blossom.name: Blossom
blossom.description: A pretty or colourful effect likened to a flower, or an effect that opens up and expands, like a flower blossoming.
